p: The pharmacokinetic properties of three compound have been determined; the compounds are adsorbed when they fulfil the Lipinski rule, where a good drug should have a LogP partition coefficient of less than 5, a weight (MW) of less than 500â€‰Da, number of HBA < 10, number of HBD < 5, and rotational bonds of less than 10 [ 46] ( Table 4).
